MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL13 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Caia Gardens and surrounding areas. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and are working to repair an underground cable fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:09AM on 5th January 2021
